Class InventoryController

java.lang.Object
com.pekings.pos.controller.InventoryController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/inventory") public class InventoryController extends Object
REST Controller for managing Inventory-related operations. Provides endpoints for CRUD operations and analytics on inventory data.

  • Method Details

    • getAllIngredients

      @GetMapping("/all") public List<Inventory> getAllIngredients()
      Retrieves all ingredients in the inventory.
      Returns:
      A list of all inventory items.

    • getIngredient

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public Inventory getIngredient(@PathVariable("id") int id)
      Retrieves a specific ingredient by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the desired ingredient.
      Returns:
      The inventory item with the given ID, or null if not found.

    • getTopIngredientsPeriodic

      @GetMapping("/top") public List<InventoryItem> getTopIngredientsPeriodic(@RequestParam(value="startDate",required=false) @DateTimeFormat(iso=DATE_TIME) Instant startDate, @RequestParam(value="endDate",required=false) @DateTimeFormat(iso=DATE_TIME) Instant endDate)
      Retrieves the most popular ingredients used within a specified time period. Example usage: /api/inventory/top?startDate=2024-01-01T00:00:00Z&endDate=2024-12-31T23:59:59Z
      Parameters:
      startDate - The start date of the period (optional).
      endDate - The end date of the period (optional).
      Returns:
      A list of the most used ingredients within the given timeframe.

    • updateIngredient

      @PatchMapping("/update") public Inventory updateIngredient(@RequestBody Inventory inventory)
      Updates the details of an existing ingredient.
      Parameters:
      inventory - The inventory item with updated details, including a valid ID.
      Returns:
      The updated inventory item, or null if the ID is not provided.

    • updateStock

      @PatchMapping("/update/stock/{id}") public Inventory updateStock(@PathVariable("id") int id, @RequestParam("amount") int amount)
      Updates the stock amount of a specific inventory item.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the inventory item to update.
      amount - The amount to add to the current stock. Use a negative value to reduce stock.
      Returns:
      The updated inventory item, or null if the item is not found.

    • addIngredient

      @PostMapping("/add") public Inventory addIngredient(@RequestBody Inventory inventory)
      Adds a new ingredient to the inventory.
      Parameters:
      inventory - The inventory item to add.
      Returns:
      The newly added inventory item after saving to the database.

    • deleteIngredient

      @DeleteMapping("/delete") public void deleteIngredient(@RequestBody int id)
      Deletes an inventory item by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the inventory item to delete.
